Package grave_escape.levels

Class Level

java.lang.Object
grave_escape.levels.Level
Direct Known Subclasses:
Level1Easy, Level1Hard, Level1Normal, Level2Easy, Level2Hard, Level2Normal, Level3Easy, Level3Hard, Level3Normal
public class Level extends Object
levels.Level class represents a template for a level. It manages the elements and their interactions between one another.

  • Field Details

    • levelName

      protected String levelName
      Holds the name of the level (e.g. "Level 1)

    • difficulty

      protected String difficulty
      Holds the name of the difficulty (e.g. "Easy")

  • Constructor Details

    • Level

      public Level(int numOfRows, int numOfCols, Position playerStart, List<Enemy> enemies, ArrayList<Objective> objectives, Position doorPosition, List<Wall> walls)
      Constructor for levels.Level object.
      Parameters:
      numOfRows - : Number of rows in the levels.Level's grid (value of max Y-coordinate)
      numOfCols - : Number of columns in the Levels' grid (value of max X-coordinate)
      playerStart - : The coordinates of where the player will start on a grid
      enemies - : A list of enemies on the grid
      objectives - : A list of objectives on the grid
      doorPosition - : The game.Position of the objectives.Door within the levels.Level
      walls - : A list of walls on the grid

  • Method Details

    • movePlayer

      public void movePlayer(Direction direction)
      This method moves a player in the given direction. If the player is at the border of the grid, they will stay in place, rather than moving.
      Parameters:
      direction - : The direction in which the player will move

    • moveEnemies

      public void moveEnemies()
      Method that moves enemies each iteration of the game loop. Only movingEnemy objects are moved. If enemies are at the border of the grid, they will stay in place, rather than moving.

    • checkCollision

      public boolean checkCollision()
      This method checks whether a player has collided with an enemy.
      Returns:
      Boolean indicating whether a player is currently on the same tile as an enemy

    • checkObjective

      public int checkObjective()
      Checks whether a player is on the same position as an objectives.Objective. If it is, it will remove it from the grid and return its score. Furthermore, if the last mandatory objective is collected, it will open the door immediately.
      Returns:
      The score of the objective collected

    • removeObjective

      public void removeObjective(Objective objective)
      Function to remove an objective from the game.Grid.
      Parameters:
      objective - : The objective to be removed

    • checkAndPlaceDoor

      public void checkAndPlaceDoor()
      Checks whether all mandatory objectives have been placed. If they have, the door will be placed.

    • isOnDoor

      public boolean isOnDoor()
      Checks whether the player is on the same position as the objectives.Door.
      Returns:
      Boolean indicating whether play is on the same position as the door

    • isDoorOpen

      public boolean isDoorOpen()
      Checks whether the door is open.
      Returns:
      Boolean value representing whether door is open

    • isWall

      public boolean isWall(int x, int y)
      Checks whether the given coordinates are a objectives.Wall.
      Parameters:
      x - : The x coordinate to be checked
      y - : The y coordinate to be checked
      Returns:
      Boolean value representing whether a coordinate is a objectives.Wall

    • resetLevel

      public void resetLevel()
      Method that will reset the level upon a player dying. This includes operations such as returning the player, enemies, objectives back to their original positions, resetting the door (by closing it and making it null), and resetting the amount of mandatory objectives collected.

    • getPlayer

      public Player getPlayer()
      Method to return player.Player object within a level, namely for the player.Player's position.
      Returns:
      player.Player object

    • getEnemies

      public List<Enemy> getEnemies()
      Method to return List of enemies within a level, namely for the enemy.Enemy positions.
      Returns:
      List of enemies

    • getObjectives

      public ArrayList<Objective> getObjectives()
      Method to return List of Objectives within a level, namely for the objectives.Objective positions.
      Returns:
      List of objectives

    • getNumOfRows

      public int getNumOfRows()
      Method to return number of rows within the levels.Level's game.Grid
      Returns:
      Integer value representing number of rows

    • getNumOfCols

      public int getNumOfCols()
      Method to return number of columns within the levels.Level's game.Grid
      Returns:
      Integer value representing number of columns

    • getDoor

      public Door getDoor()
      Method to return objectives.Door object within a level
      Returns:
      objectives.Door object

    • getDoorPosition

      public Position getDoorPosition()
      Method to return the initial door position
      Returns:
      game.Position with coordinates to door

    • getWalls

      public List<Wall> getWalls()
      Method to return List of Walls within a level, namely for the objectives.Wall positions.
      Returns:
      List of Walls

    • getMandatoryCount

      public int getMandatoryCount()
      Method to return the amount of mandatory objectives left
      Returns:
      int value representing the number of mandatory objectives left

    • getLevelName

      public String getLevelName()
      Method to return the name of the level
      Returns:
      String value containing the level name (e.g. "Level 1")

    • getDifficulty

      public String getDifficulty()
      Method to return the difficulty name of the level
      Returns:
      String value containing the difficulty name (e.g. "Easy")
